name: UNBELIEVABLE ZOMBIE
description:
Unbelievable Zombie is my FPS game on Unity where this game is inspired by Left 4 Dead and Call of Duty Zombies. Unbelievable Zombie is a PVE game where it is a round-based style in a competitive small area-based map. My game design skills have improved throughout designing the fundamentals as this game is really fun to play and setting up a system to let my player interact with environmental assets by using the vending machine to gain ammo and health. Unbelievable Zombie includes game elements like game design, player & AI input and animations. These are important to build a zombie survivor FPS game where my game design knowledge has increased to build a PVE map. The health system for both enemies and player are included which are important for game development. 

Controls: W (Move forward), A (Move Left), S (Move backwards), D (Move Right), Shift (Run), Spacebar (Jump), E (Interact with the vending machines), Left Click (Shoot), Right Click (Aim), R (Reload) and Scroll with the middle mouse (Change gun).
